txt.en: 'I must send you next to the north-east to speak with the owner of Hengstacer Farm. Recent events surrounding the farm have reached my ears and speak of a dwarf who has come under attack by Orcs while looking for assistance from the farmhands.\n\n'If you are willing, head north-east and speak with Éogar, the owner of the farm.'

'Orcs? You sound like that foolish dwarf who was here not long ago. I will tell you the same that I told to him... talk to my farmhand, Cam Applewood. \n\n'He is the one spreading the hay over there.'
'Cam will be the one who might help you. Speak with him.'
'You should speak at once with Éogar at the Hengstacer Farm.'
A visiting dwarf at the Hengstacer Farm came under attack from some Orcs.
Talk to Éogar at the Hengstacer Farm
Hengstacer Farm lay north-east of Saeradan's Cabin, up the eastward road from the Old Greenway Fort.\n\nSaeradan sent you to the Hengstacer Farm to investigate talk of Orcs.
Talk to Cam Applewood at the Hengstacer Farm
Cam Applewood is at the Hengstacer Farm.\n\nÉogar told you to speak with Cam Applewood, his farmhand.
